title: Savage Courtship
description: Vanessa could kick herself! It had been a simple misunderstanding...how dared Benedict Savage imply that she'd deliberately set out to seduce him? The very idea was outrageous; he simply wasn't her type! No matter that he was the last word in cool, suave sophistication â€” he was also her boss, and a formidable sexual predator in the bargain. But Vanessa had no intention of falling prey to his dark charm - had Benedict met his match at last...?
author: Susan Napier
